properties.title: Taxidermist Schneiter
properties.abstract: Discover the extraordinary skill and imagination of taxidermy. Visit of the gallery «Noah's Ark» and its more than 3,000 stuffed animals, displayed in their natural surroundings.
properties.description: A small village in the Delémont valley is home to Europe's largest taxidermy exhibition. More than 3,000 different species are on show here. This is a magical visit that transports visitors to every part of the world.
properties.name: Jura Tourisme
